Hello everyone~

During this period of celebrating Genshin Impact's 1st Anniversary, Mimo brings you exclusive news
'''HoYoFair: Genshin Impact Fan Art Celebration 2021''' is coming soon!

For this HoYoFair event, we have invited talented creators and prepared many interesting programs~

In addition, Mimo is curious to know your favorite characters after all these adventures in Teyvat! Leave a comment in this post to share your opinions with the community~

During the event, simply log in and use the HoYoLAB application and leave a comment about what you would like to say to your favorite Genshin Impact character in this post. You can then enter the raffle and stand a chance to win great prizes!

==Event Duration==
*Start and End Dates: September 17, 2021 – September 26, 2021 23:59
*Results: September 30, 2021

==How to Participate==
# During the event, log into and use the HoYoLAB application.
# Leave a comment in this post about your favorite character and what you want to say to them to enter the raffle.

==Notes==
# Travelers, please pay attention to System Messages, as information of prize-winners will be sent out via such messages. We ask prize-winners to provide their shipping address according to the prompts stated in the system message. Prize-winners who have not provided their address within one month after the system message is sent will be deemed to have voluntarily forfeited their prizes.
# Each Traveler is only eligible to receive one prize, and repeated comments are only counted once.
# Comments of the following nature will be regarded as invalid: comments with content that violates our Community Rules, comments that plagiarize or misappropriate the content of other creators, replying to a comment on the post (instead of commenting directly to the post itself) or creating a new post (instead of commenting on this post), comments with no relation to Genshin Impact, comments that contain any form of advertising, and those which seek to spread malicious rumors or discredit the game and its characters.
